Html:
Hello all,

I am using a 32x32 pixels image for a custom marker but I need the marker to be placed in the CENTER of the icon and not in the corner. How can I set an offset so that the bitmap's center is on the marker's location?

Thanks for any help!

When working with Google Maps online, this can be done via this code:

anchor: new google.maps.Point(16, 34)

Is there a similar function in GMap.NET?

Figured it out...

Here it is for those that might have the same issue:

flightTrackerMarker.Offset = new System.Drawing.Point(-16, -16);
